name: dnd-computer-labyrinth
description: A modernized tribute to the 1980 Mattel Electronics D&D Computer Labyrinth Game

scripts.setup: node setup-audio.js && npm install && cd client && npm install
scripts.build: npm run build --workspace=client && npm run build --workspace=server
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm install --workspace=client && npm install --workspace=server && npm install --workspace=shared
